answers.answer: How many weeks are you? It's normal to get swollen at the very end
Okay good. I figured I was just freakiin myself out and I'm 39+3

Oh yes definitely normal, and then after you deliver they will get even more swollen. I slept on a couch we had in our room for feeding at night so that I could elevate my feet and get them to go down
Ok thanks so muxh deff feel better now!!!
I thought it goes away after delivery?? ^^^^ Lol I'm so over being swollen!!

question: Can your hands swelling mean something other then preeclampsia? I noticed mine were swollen today and my feet also since yesterday. I'm kinda worrying myself. I looked into the symptoms of it. And I realized earlier today I told my BD I was seeing spots but haven't again since. And at my appointment on thursday my doc mentioned I gained 4 lbs in a week and it wasn't baby she said it had to be fluid but I was swollen or anything at the time. I think I'm just worrying myself but ftm so I don't know what's normal or not.
title: preeclampsia?
